name: Sorce
description:
Sorce

Sorce is an online arena-based game where the main focus is to eliminate your opponents using a variety of spells and abilities.

The game consists of three types of spells: area of effect, shield and projectile - each of which has an element attached to it that will have a different effect upon hitting a player.

Sorce was made for OneGameAMonth's June 2013 game jam and updated in July 2016 to add a revamped UI and apply several bug fixes and tweaks.
